Hey, I'm Hausen!

I'm based in Curitiba, Brazil. I will be majoring in Political Science in about a semester from now. My main interests in Data Science and programming are how to use Computer Vision, and Data Analytics in order to close the gap between Social Sciences and technology in order to produce tangible solutions.
